title: The Muppets Go Medieval
description: Troy McClure’s 1977 classic and his final theatrical film. Adventure is afoot in Hamelot. Kermit sets out to rescue Miss Piggy from Sir Lies-a-lot.
altHero: Troy McClure woos Miss Piggy on a stone balcony
alt1: Kermit in knight’s armor holding a sword
alt2: Miss Piggy draped in McClure’s arms
alt4: a closeup of Troy McClure’s wrinkly face
